msItem.title: Shahnamah.
msItem.note: Folio 1a: Stamp for presentation to the Society, the name left blank. Flyleaf after text, verso: a) Note of ownership by Ram Narayan Singh, with curses on claimants to possession. b) Two lines of verse in Arabic script. Headings in red. Three illuminated headings at the opening of divisions of the text. 16 miniatures in a provincial Indian style, probably eighteenth century. Some spaces for headings, illumination and miniatures left bland. Does not have a prose preface.

listBibl.bibl: Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 14 in list of Persian MSS.

layoutDesc.p: 27 lines to the page in four columns

bindingDesc.p: English mottled brown leather binding, with red spine, tooling and marbled paper doublures.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
